backend/main.mo: Main backend actor implementing a prediction market platform with markets, user profiles, positions, transactions, comments, analytics, wallet balances, and access control including admin management functions.
backend/migration.mo: Migration module defining old actor state types and a run function that currently performs no transformations, simply returning the old state unchanged.
feature_evidence.json: Feature evidence report documenting four admin management features implemented in AdminPage.tsx and useQueries.ts with high confidence, including admin list display, add/remove admin forms, and React Query hooks.
frontend-file-summaries.txt: Comprehensive summaries of all frontend files describing components, pages, hooks, and styling for the Vici prediction market application with authentication, market trading, portfolio management, and admin features.
frontend/index.html: HTML entry point with Vici branding, favicon reference to the coin logo, and root div for React mounting.
frontend/src/App.tsx: Root application component managing routing between pages, authentication state, profile setup modal, and access control that restricts portfolio, wallet, rush, profile, and admin pages to authenticated users.
frontend/src/components/AccessDeniedScre: Full-screen component displaying a shield alert icon and login button when unauthenticated users attempt to access protected pages.
frontend/src/components/Footer.tsx: Footer component with Vici branding, resource links, social media icons for Twitter and GitHub, and caffeine.ai attribution.
frontend/src/components/Header.tsx: Main navigation header component with responsive menu, authentication controls, user profile dropdown, and navigation items (Home, Markets, Rush, Portfolio, Wallet, Leaderboard, Learn, Admin). Handles Internet Identity login/logout and displays user balance.
frontend/src/components/MarketAnalyticsC: Displays market analytics with tabbed charts showing odds trends (line chart) and trading volume (bar chart) over time using Recharts library.
frontend/src/components/MarketCard.tsx: Card component displaying market summary including title, status badge, categories, YES/NO odds, expiration date, and invite-only indicator. Clickable to view full market details.
frontend/src/components/MarketDepthPanel: Shows market depth with current YES/NO forecasts, position summaries, and detailed tables of all YES and NO positions including amounts and average prices.
frontend/src/components/MarketDiscussion: Comment section for markets with posting functionality for authenticated users, comment display with timestamps, and moderation controls for admins to hide comments.
frontend/src/components/ProfileSetupModa: Modal dialog for new user onboarding that prompts for nickname and initializes user profile with 1,000 Íùû starting balance.
frontend/src/components/ReceiveTokenPane: React component that displays the user's Principal ID with copy-to-clipboard functionality and generates a QR code for receiving ICP or ckUSDC tokens.
frontend/src/components/SendTokenForm.ts: React form component for sending ICP or ckUSDC tokens with Principal ID validation and balance checking; currently shows a placeholder message indicating ledger integration is not yet implemented.
frontend/src/hooks/useActor.ts: Custom React hook that creates and manages an authenticated or anonymous actor instance based on Internet Identity, invalidating dependent queries when the actor changes.
frontend/src/hooks/useInternetIdentity.t: React context provider and hook for Internet Identity authentication, managing login state, identity persistence, and AuthClient lifecycle with configurable options.
frontend/src/hooks/useQueries.ts: Collection of React Query hooks for interacting with the backend canister, including user profiles, friends management, markets, positions, transactions, comments, analytics, and wallet operations.
frontend/src/index.css: Tailwind CSS configuration with custom CSS variables defining light and dark theme color schemes for UI components including sidebar, charts, and semantic colors.
frontend/src/main.tsx: Application entry point that sets up React Query and Internet Identity providers, then renders the root App component.
frontend/src/pages/AdminPage.tsx: Admin dashboard page with tabs for creating markets, resolving markets, granting ViciCoins to users, and managing admin roles with owner-only permissions for admin management.
frontend/src/pages/HomePage.tsx: Displays a searchable, filterable grid of prediction markets with tabs for all/trending/expiring/resolved markets. Includes search functionality and uses MarketCard components to render individual markets.
frontend/src/pages/LeaderboardPage.tsx: Shows a leaderboard of top traders ranked by Vici Coin balance, featuring a visual podium for top 3 users and a scrollable list for remaining ranks with trophy/medal icons.
frontend/src/pages/LearnPage.tsx: Landing/educational page with hero banner, stats section showing active markets and starting coins, and feature highlights explaining why users should trade on Vici.
frontend/src/pages/MarketDetailPage.tsx: Detailed view of a single prediction market with trading interface, market depth panel, analytics chart, discussion/comments section, and invite management for private markets.
frontend/src/pages/MarketsPage.tsx: Displays a searchable, filterable grid of prediction markets with tabs for all/trending/expiring/resolved markets, identical functionality to HomePage.
frontend/src/pages/PortfolioPage.tsx: User portfolio dashboard showing balance, open positions, and total invested with tabs for viewing active positions and transaction history in table format.
frontend/src/pages/ProfilePage.tsx: Profile management page displaying user nickname, principal ID, join date, and friends list with add/remove functionality. Includes form validation, error handling with toast notifications, and friend management via Principal IDs.
frontend/src/pages/RushPage.tsx: Rush betting mode page that presents markets sequentially with swipe gestures (left=NO, right=YES, up=skip) and keyboard shortcuts. Handles trade execution with amount input and advances through a queue of markets.
frontend/src/pages/WalletPage.tsx: Wallet management page displaying ICP and ckUSDC balances with send/receive tabs. Uses formatted balance display converting from smallest units (e8s) and integrates SendTokenForm and ReceiveTokenPanel components.
frontend/tailwind.config.js: Tailwind CSS configuration with custom theme extensions including OKLCH color system, sidebar colors, chart colors, custom animations (accordion), and plugins for typography, container queries, and animations.
project_state.json: Project state tracking document for a prediction/betting app with friends system, private markets, rush betting mode, and IC wallet integration (ICP/ckUSDC). Includes architectural notes, known issues, and feature tracking with requirement IDs.
